metadata.title: CVE-2023-43279 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Null Pointer Dereference in mask_cidr6 component at cidr.c in Tcpreplay4.4.4 allows attackers to crash the application via crafted tcprewritecommand.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-43279` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.5.0
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0').
